code: import{useState,useRef,useCallback}from'react';import Camera from'react-html5-camera-photo';import'react-html5-camera-photo/build/css/index.css';import Webcam from"react-webcam";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const videoConstraints={width:1280,height:720,facingMode:"user"};export default function Photo(){const[isCamera,setIsCamera]=useState(true);const[dataPhoto,setDataPhoto]=useState();const webcamRef=useRef(null);const capture=useCallback(()=>{const imageSrc=webcamRef.current.getScreenshot();setDataPhoto(imageSrc);setIsCamera(false);console.log(imageSrc);},[webcamRef]);function handleTakePhoto(dataUri){console.log('takePhoto',dataUri);setDataPhoto(dataUri);setIsCamera(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Toma una foto de tu ID"}),isCamera&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"foto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Webcam,{audio:false,ref:webcamRef,screenshotFormat:"image/jpeg",videoConstraints:videoConstraints}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"link",onClick:capture,children:"Tomar Foto"})]}),!isCamera&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:dataPhoto,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",onClick:()=>setIsCamera(true),children:"Tomar otra foto"})]})]});}
